data.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
data.description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max sets a new standard for smartphones with its A17 Bionic chip, delivering industry-leading performance and efficiency. It features a stunning 6.7-inch 120Hz OLED display for crystal-clear visuals and buttery-smooth scrolling. The advanced triple-camera system offers unparalleled photo and video quality, even in low light. Built with aerospace-grade titanium, this phone is not only sleek but also incredibly durable. With improved battery life and 5G support, it’s perfect for power users who demand the best.
points: A17 Bionic chip for unmatched performance
6.7-inch 120Hz OLED display
Triple-camera system with enhanced low-light capabilities
Aerospace-grade titanium build for durability
Improved battery life and 5G support

data.name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
data.description: Designed for adventurers, the Apple Watch Ultra 2 combines rugged durability with advanced features. With its titanium case and sapphire crystal display, it can withstand extreme conditions while maintaining a sleek appearance. The Ultra 2 offers advanced health monitoring, including heart rate, blood oxygen levels, and sleep tracking. Its dual-frequency GPS ensures accurate navigation, even in remote areas. The watch is water-resistant up to 100 meters, making it ideal for swimmers and divers. Enjoy up to 36 hours of battery life on a single charge.
points: Titanium case and sapphire crystal display for durability
Advanced health monitoring: heart rate, blood oxygen, and sleep tracking
Dual-frequency GPS for precise navigation
Water-resistant up to 100 meters
36-hour battery life on a single charge

data.name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
data.description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch is a powerhouse laptop designed for professionals and creatives. Powered by the M3 Pro chip, it delivers blazing-fast performance for demanding tasks like video editing, 3D rendering, and software development. The stunning Liquid Retina XDR display provides vibrant colors and extreme contrast for an unparalleled visual experience. With up to 64GB of RAM and 8TB of storage, it’s built to handle the most resource-intensive workflows. Its improved thermal design ensures sustained performance under heavy workloads.
points: M3 Pro chip for lightning-fast performance
Liquid Retina XDR display for vibrant colors and high contrast
Up to 64GB RAM and 8TB storage for intensive workflows
Advanced thermal design for sustained performance
Ideal for video editing, 3D rendering, and software development

data.name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
data.description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones offer the ultimate noise-canceling experience. Designed for audiophiles, these headphones deliver rich, immersive sound with exceptional clarity. The adaptive noise-canceling technology adjusts to your environment for uninterrupted listening. With a lightweight design and plush ear cushions, they provide long-lasting comfort. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life and quick charging that gives you 5 hours of playback in just 10 minutes.
points: Adaptive noise-canceling technology for a seamless experience
Rich, immersive sound with exceptional clarity
Lightweight design with plush ear cushions for comfort
30-hour battery life with quick charging (5 hours in 10 minutes)
Ideal for audiophiles and immersive listening

data.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
data.description: The Logitech MX Master 3S is an ergonomic wireless mouse built for productivity. Its advanced precision sensor works on virtually any surface, including glass. With customizable buttons and a hyper-fast scroll wheel, you can navigate through tasks effortlessly. The ergonomic design reduces strain on your hand during extended use. The mouse offers cross-device control, allowing you to work seamlessly across multiple devices. With USB-C fast charging, enjoy weeks of use on a single charge.
points: Ergonomic design reduces hand strain
Advanced precision sensor works on almost any surface
Customizable buttons and hyper-fast scroll wheel
Cross-device control for seamless multitasking
USB-C fast charging with weeks of battery life

data.name: PlayStation 5 Console
data.description: The PlayStation 5 takes gaming to the next level with its ultra-fast SSD and ray tracing technology. Experience stunning 4K graphics and incredibly smooth gameplay at up to 120fps. Its new DualSense controller introduces haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for a more immersive gaming experience. The console’s sleek design fits seamlessly into any setup. With a growing library of exclusive games, the PS5 is a must-have for any gaming enthusiast.
points: Ultra-fast SSD for minimal load times
4K graphics and gameplay up to 120fps
DualSense controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers
Sleek design fits into any gaming setup
Exclusive library of must-play games
